In addition to the foregoing there are a number of new and unusual factors
both good and bad which result from this system. Over-all color and picture
stability seems good once proper parometers have been arrived at. Asking prices
for the equipment is low as compared with that of other color pickup apparatus
presently available.
Contrasting these factors* however* is the inescapable conclusion that the
system as proposed lacks the acid test of extended trail and use under actual
operating conditions. All in all the system deserves sincere scrutiny and interest
on the part of all potential users until such a time as its scope and effectiveness
can be determined,
